## Plan to Remove Features:

1. **Remove Pricing Tab and related functionality**
2. **Remove Quiz Tab and related functionality** 
3. **Remove News Tab and related functionality**
4. **Remove Profile Tab**
5. **Remove .json files (news.json, quizzes.json)**
6. **Fix .txt file loading issues**

currentFile.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?>
<BorderPane prefHeight="700.0" prefWidth="1000.0" styleClass="root"
            xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12"
            xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1">
    <!-- Top Menu Bar -->
    <top>
        <MenuBar>
            <menus>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="File">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Import Data"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Export Data"/>
                        <SeparatorMenuItem mnemonicParsing="false"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Exit" onAction="#handleExit"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Edit">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Preferences" onAction="#handlePreferences"/>
                        <SeparatorMenuItem mnemonicParsing="false"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Toggle Theme" onAction="#handleToggleTheme"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="AI">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Ask AI" onAction="#handleAskAI"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Recommend for Me" onAction="#handleRecommend"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Help">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="About"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
            </menus>
        </MenuBar>
    </top>

    <!-- Main Content Area -->
    <center>
        <StackPane>
            <!-- Ambient translucent SVG layer for main app -->
            <Pane fx:id="ambientMainLayer" pickOnBounds="false" mouseTransparent="true"/>
            <TabPane fx:id="mainTabPane" styleClass="main-tab-pane" tabClosingPolicy="UNAVAILABLE">
            <tabs>
                <!-- Movies Tab -->
                <Tab fx:id="moviesTab" styleClass="main-tab" text="🎬 Movies">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="movieView" source="movie-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>



                <!-- Series Tab -->
                <Tab fx:id="seriesTab" styleClass="main-tab" text="📺 Series">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="seriesView" source="series-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Watchlists Tab -->
                <Tab fx:id="watchlistTab" styleClass="main-tab" text="📋 Watchlists">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="watchlistView" source="watchlist-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Advanced Search Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="🔍 Search">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="15.0" styleClass="search-header neon-search">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="15.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="20.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label styleClass="search-title" text="Advanced Search"/>
                                    <Separator/>

                                    <!-- Search Form -->
                                    <GridPane hgap="15.0" vgap="12.0" styleClass="search-grid neon-search-grid">
                                        <columnConstraints>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        </columnConstraints>

                                        <rowConstraints>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                        </rowConstraints>

                                        <!-- Title -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Title:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="titleField" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>

                                        <!-- Genre -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Genre(s):" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>
                                        <ListView fx:id="genreListView" GridPane.columnIndex="3" GridPane.rowIndex="0"
                                                  prefHeight="80.0" editable="false" styleClass="multi-select-list"/>

                                        <!-- Actor -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Actor:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="actorField" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>

                                        <!-- Director -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Director:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="directorField" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>

                                        <!-- IMDB Rating Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="IMDB Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="2"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="minImdbSpinner" styleClass="rating-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="maxImdbSpinner" styleClass="rating-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- User Rating Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="User Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="2"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="minUserSpinner" styleClass="rating-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="maxUserSpinner" styleClass="rating-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Duration Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Duration (min):" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="3"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="3">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="minDurationSpinner" styleClass="duration-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="maxDurationSpinner" styleClass="duration-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Year Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Year Range:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="3"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="3">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="yearFromSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="yearToSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Description -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Description:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="4"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="descriptionField" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="4" GridPane.columnSpan="3"/>

                                        <!-- Search Buttons -->
                                        <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="15" GridPane.columnSpan="4"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="5">
                                            <Button onAction="#handleSearch" styleClass="primary-button" text="Search"/>
                                            <Button onAction="#clearSearch" styleClass="secondary-button" text="Clear"/>
                                        </HBox>
                                    </GridPane>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>

                            <center>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label text="Search Results" styleClass="section-title"/>
                                    <!-- Plan-gated insight toggles -->
                                    <HBox spacing="10.0" alignment="CENTER_LEFT">
                                        <CheckBox fx:id="trendingToggle" text="Trending Insights (Pro+)"/>
                                        <CheckBox fx:id="aiSimilarToggle" text="AI Similar Picks (Ultra)"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                    <TableView fx:id="searchResultsTable" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" styleClass="fantasy-mystic">
                                        <columns>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultTitleColumn" text="Title" prefWidth="200"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultYearColumn" text="Year" prefWidth="80"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultTypeColumn" text="Type" prefWidth="100"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultGenreColumn" text="Genre" prefWidth="120"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultImdbColumn" text="IMDB Rating" prefWidth="100"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultDirectorColumn" text="Director" prefWidth="150"/>
                                        </columns>
                                    </TableView>
                                </VBox>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Forum Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="💬 Forum">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="forumView" source="forum-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- News & Articles Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="📰 News">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="newsView" source="news-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Quizzes & Trivia Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="❓ Quizzes">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="quizView" source="quiz-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Pricing Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="💎 Pricing">
                    <content>
                        <ScrollPane fitToWidth="true" styleClass="pricing-section">
                            <content>
                                <VBox spacing="18.0" alignment="TOP_CENTER">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets topRightBottomLeft="20"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label text="Choose Your Plan" styleClass="tab-title"/>
                                    <HBox spacing="18.0" alignment="CENTER">
                                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="pricing-card basic">
                                            <Label text="Free" styleClass="pricing-title"/>
                                            <Label text="\$0 / mo" styleClass="pricing-price"/>
                                            <Label text="• Basic browsing\n• Local watchlists\n• Community access"/>
                                            <Button text="Get Started" styleClass="primary-button" onAction="#handlePlanFree"/>
                                        </VBox>
                                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="pricing-card pro">
                                            <Label text="Pro" styleClass="pricing-title"/>
                                            <Label text="\$4.99 / mo" styleClass="pricing-price"/>
                                            <Label text="• Advanced search\n• Theme customization\n• Priority updates"/>
                                            <Button text="Upgrade" styleClass="accent-button" onAction="#handlePlanPro"/>
                                        </VBox>
                                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="pricing-card ultra">
                                            <Label text="Ultra" styleClass="pricing-title"/>
                                            <Label text="\$9.99 / mo" styleClass="pricing-price"/>
                                            <Label text="• Everything in Pro\n• Cloud sync (future)\n• Early access features"/>
                                            <Button text="Go Ultra" styleClass="danger-button" onAction="#handlePlanUltra"/>
                                        </VBox>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </content>
                        </ScrollPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>
            </tabs>
            </TabPane>
        </StackPane>
    </center>

    <!-- Bottom Status Bar -->
    <bottom>
        <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0" styleClass="status-bar">
            <padding>
                <Insets bottom="5.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="5.0"/>
            </padding>
            <Label fx:id="statusLabel" styleClass="status-text" text="Ready"/>
            <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
            <HBox fx:id="userBox" alignment="CENTER_RIGHT" spacing="8.0">
                <ImageView fx:id="planIcon" fitHeight="18.0" fitWidth="18.0" preserveRatio="true"/>
                <Label fx:id="userLabel" styleClass="status-text" text="Not logged in"/>
                <Label fx:id="planBadge" text="FREE" styleClass="plan-badge free" visible="false"/>
            </HBox>
        </HBox>
    </bottom>

</BorderPane>

currentFile.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?>
<BorderPane prefHeight="700.0" prefWidth="1000.0" styleClass="root"
            xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12"
            xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1">
    <!-- Top Menu Bar -->
    <top>
        <MenuBar>
            <menus>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="File">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Import Data"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Export Data"/>
                        <SeparatorMenuItem mnemonicParsing="false"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Exit" onAction="#handleExit"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Edit">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Preferences" onAction="#handlePreferences"/>
                        <SeparatorMenuItem mnemonicParsing="false"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Toggle Theme" onAction="#handleToggleTheme"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="AI">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Ask AI" onAction="#handleAskAI"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Recommend for Me" onAction="#handleRecommend"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Help">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="About"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
            </menus>
        </MenuBar>
    </top>

    <!-- Main Content Area -->
    <center>
        <StackPane>
            <!-- Ambient translucent SVG layer for main app -->
            <Pane fx:id="ambientMainLayer" pickOnBounds="false" mouseTransparent="true"/>
            <TabPane fx:id="mainTabPane" styleClass="main-tab-pane" tabClosingPolicy="UNAVAILABLE">
            <tabs>
                <!-- Movies Tab -->
                <Tab fx:id="moviesTab" styleClass="main-tab" text="🎬 Movies">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="movieView" source="movie-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>



                <!-- Series Tab -->
                <Tab fx:id="seriesTab" styleClass="main-tab" text="📺 Series">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="seriesView" source="series-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Watchlists Tab -->
                <Tab fx:id="watchlistTab" styleClass="main-tab" text="📋 Watchlists">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="watchlistView" source="watchlist-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Advanced Search Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="🔍 Search">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="15.0" styleClass="search-header neon-search">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="15.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="20.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label styleClass="search-title" text="Advanced Search"/>
                                    <Separator/>

                                    <!-- Search Form -->
                                    <GridPane hgap="15.0" vgap="12.0" styleClass="search-grid neon-search-grid">
                                        <columnConstraints>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        </columnConstraints>

                                        <rowConstraints>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                            <RowConstraints minHeight="10.0" prefHeight="30.0" vgrow="SOMETIMES"/>
                                        </rowConstraints>

                                        <!-- Title -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Title:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="titleField" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>

                                        <!-- Genre -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Genre(s):" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>
                                        <ListView fx:id="genreListView" GridPane.columnIndex="3" GridPane.rowIndex="0"
                                                  prefHeight="80.0" editable="false" styleClass="multi-select-list"/>

                                        <!-- Actor -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Actor:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="actorField" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>

                                        <!-- Director -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Director:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="directorField" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>

                                        <!-- IMDB Rating Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="IMDB Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="2"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="minImdbSpinner" styleClass="rating-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="maxImdbSpinner" styleClass="rating-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- User Rating Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="User Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="2"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="minUserSpinner" styleClass="rating-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="maxUserSpinner" styleClass="rating-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Duration Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Duration (min):" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="3"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="3">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="minDurationSpinner" styleClass="duration-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="maxDurationSpinner" styleClass="duration-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Year Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Year Range:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="3"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="3">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="yearFromSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="yearToSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Description -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Description:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="4"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="descriptionField" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="4" GridPane.columnSpan="3"/>

                                        <!-- Search Buttons -->
                                        <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="15" GridPane.columnSpan="4"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="5">
                                            <Button onAction="#handleSearch" styleClass="primary-button" text="Search"/>
                                            <Button onAction="#clearSearch" styleClass="secondary-button" text="Clear"/>
                                        </HBox>
                                    </GridPane>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>

                            <center>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label text="Search Results" styleClass="section-title"/>
                                    <!-- Plan-gated insight toggles -->
                                    <HBox spacing="10.0" alignment="CENTER_LEFT">
                                        <CheckBox fx:id="trendingToggle" text="Trending Insights (Pro+)"/>
                                        <CheckBox fx:id="aiSimilarToggle" text="AI Similar Picks (Ultra)"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                    <TableView fx:id="searchResultsTable" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" styleClass="fantasy-mystic">
                                        <columns>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultTitleColumn" text="Title" prefWidth="200"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultYearColumn" text="Year" prefWidth="80"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultTypeColumn" text="Type" prefWidth="100"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultGenreColumn" text="Genre" prefWidth="120"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultImdbColumn" text="IMDB Rating" prefWidth="100"/>
                                            <TableColumn fx:id="resultDirectorColumn" text="Director" prefWidth="150"/>
                                        </columns>
                                    </TableView>
                                </VBox>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Forum Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="💬 Forum">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="forumView" source="forum-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- News & Articles Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="📰 News">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="newsView" source="news-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Quizzes & Trivia Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="❓ Quizzes">
                    <content>
                        <fx:include fx:id="quizView" source="quiz-view.fxml"/>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Pricing Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="💎 Pricing">
                    <content>
                        <ScrollPane fitToWidth="true" styleClass="pricing-section">
                            <content>
                                <VBox spacing="18.0" alignment="TOP_CENTER">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets topRightBottomLeft="20"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label text="Choose Your Plan" styleClass="tab-title"/>
                                    <HBox spacing="18.0" alignment="CENTER">
                                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="pricing-card basic">
                                            <Label text="Free" styleClass="pricing-title"/>
                                            <Label text="\$0 / mo" styleClass="pricing-price"/>
                                            <Label text="• Basic browsing\n• Local watchlists\n• Community access"/>
                                            <Button text="Get Started" styleClass="primary-button" onAction="#handlePlanFree"/>
                                        </VBox>
                                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="pricing-card pro">
                                            <Label text="Pro" styleClass="pricing-title"/>
                                            <Label text="\$4.99 / mo" styleClass="pricing-price"/>
                                            <Label text="• Advanced search\n• Theme customization\n• Priority updates"/>
                                            <Button text="Upgrade" styleClass="accent-button" onAction="#handlePlanPro"/>
                                        </VBox>
                                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="pricing-card ultra">
                                            <Label text="Ultra" styleClass="pricing-title"/>
                                            <Label text="\$9.99 / mo" styleClass="pricing-price"/>
                                            <Label text="• Everything in Pro\n• Cloud sync (future)\n• Early access features"/>
                                            <Button text="Go Ultra" styleClass="danger-button" onAction="#handlePlanUltra"/>
                                        </VBox>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </content>
                        </ScrollPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>
            </tabs>
            </TabPane>
        </StackPane>
    </center>

    <!-- Bottom Status Bar -->
    <bottom>
        <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0" styleClass="status-bar">
            <padding>
                <Insets bottom="5.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="5.0"/>
            </padding>
            <Label fx:id="statusLabel" styleClass="status-text" text="Ready"/>
            <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
            <HBox fx:id="userBox" alignment="CENTER_RIGHT" spacing="8.0">
                <ImageView fx:id="planIcon" fitHeight="18.0" fitWidth="18.0" preserveRatio="true"/>
                <Label fx:id="userLabel" styleClass="status-text" text="Not logged in"/>
                <Label fx:id="planBadge" text="FREE" styleClass="plan-badge free" visible="false"/>
            </HBox>
        </HBox>
    </bottom>

</BorderPane>
